title: Bright Spacious Apartment Available August!
posting_body: Rarely available, bright and spacious apartment in quiet residential neighborhood.
Includes dining room, dishwasher, microwave, and walk-in pantry.
In summer, air conditioning units are provided and we provide installation and removal seasonally.
In the winter you will save $$ as heat is included!
Your unit has its own private balcony and a lovely shared yard.
Laundry in building.
Great location, close to schools, shopping, restaurants, and extremely convenient transportation options!
Apartment is currently occupied, so please allow at least 24 hours notice to view the unit.
Photos are from prior move in when apartment was empty to give you a sense of the space.
Details:
One year lease
Application fee is $55 (credit and background check)
Heat, water, sewer, garbage are included.
Electricity, internet, and gas for stove not included
Move in fee is $500 (no security deposit)
No pets
No smoking
Unit Amenities:
Dishwasher
Refrigerator
Microwave
Oven
Building Amenities:
On Site Laundry
Fenced Yard
Location:
Half mile to Kedzie Orange line
Short walk to 47th St, Kedzie, & Archer buses
Quick access to I55
Easy train commute downtown & by car 15 min to IIT, 20 min to UIC
2 blocks to Pete's Market
Near McKinley Park, Archer Heights, Pilsen, Bridgeport
Interested in this property?
Reply to this listing for more information.
